perturbation.original_text: Users will be able to go to the Pelican Delivers front-end website and easily search, browse, and order cannabis. Before a user can gain access to the website, they must first verify their birthday (users must be 21 and over to even view the website).
perturbation.changed_text: Users will be able to go to the Pelican Delivers front-end website and easily search, browse, and order cannabis. Before a user can gain access to the website, they must first verify their birthday (users must be 18 and over to even view the website).
perturbation.explanation: In Washington state, where Bellevue is located, the legal age to purchase cannabis is 21. Changing the age to 18 contradicts state law, potentially leading to legal issues related to underage access and sales.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Washington State law regarding legal age for cannabis purchase and consumption.

perturbation.original_text: Each driver will have a set amount of time (e.g. 10 seconds) to accept or reject the order, or the order will automatically be rejected by time and the lack of response will be recorded for future reference/internal driver ranking in the future.
perturbation.changed_text: Each driver will have a completely discretionary amount of time to accept or reject the order, or the order will automatically be rejected only if the driver manually rejects the order.
perturbation.explanation: The original text suggests a structured timer. The new text contradicts it making it entirely at the discretion of the driver to accept or reject, with the driver not being penalized for not accepting an order. This contradicts any reasonable expectation of due diligence and efficient service, creating conflict with potential contractual obligations
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract / Failure to Provide Services.

perturbation.original_text: Commission fees - 25% commission on delivery orders. Admin will have the ability to change the % or fee based on dispensary
perturbation.changed_text: Commission fees - 25% commission on delivery orders. Admin will have the right to arbitrarily modify the percentage or fee based on dispensary, based on undisclosed metrics.
perturbation.explanation: By adding 'arbitrarily modify the percentage or fee based on dispensary, based on undisclosed metrics' to the original text, the fee structure for the dispensary becomes uncertain. This contradicts the intent for financial transparency. The use of 'undisclosed metrics' is legally challenging.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract / Lack of Good Faith and Fair Dealing.
